Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Paul Bunyan in a circus setting, escalating through a public spectacle, a confrontation, and a revenge plot by a former strongman, Matto Grasso, ultimately resolved by Paul Bunyan's strength and heroism.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Spectacle and Public Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan's circus act and the public's enthusiastic reception of the circus's arrival, setting a lively and entertaining atmosphere.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Escalating Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts the tone from spectacle to conflict as a man intervenes in a threatening situation involving Billings, which quickly escalates with the introduction of a pistol and an injury, raising the stakes and introducing danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Threat with a Pistol and Injury

sub_scenes.title: Job Offer and Initial Acceptance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides exposition about Matto Grasso and transitions into the Circus Owner offering Paul Bunyan a job as the new strong man, presenting a turning point and a new opportunity for Paul.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of Matto Grasso and Invitation to the Circus
Job Offer as the New Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Revenge and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Paul Bunyan's successful performance as the circus strongman, contrasted with Matto Grasso's vengeful plotting and subsequent arson attempt, culminating in Paul Bunyan's heroic intervention and thwarting of Grasso's plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Performance and Matto Grasso's Envy
Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Chaos and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's continued attempts at sabotage by releasing Gigantico, a giant ape, leading to chaos and a chase as the circus guard pursues Matto Grasso, further disrupting the circus and escalating the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Foul Deed: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico Escapes and the Pursuit Begins

sub_scenes.title: Arena Confrontation and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows the chase into the circus arena, where Matto Grasso uses various circus equipment as weapons against the pursuing guard, leading to a physical confrontation and ultimately Matto Grasso's capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Job Offer and North Woods Rejection

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Ogress Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's fantastical encounter with the 'Awful Ogress of Tibet,' involving supernatural elements, a quest for help, and a confrontation with a deceptive witch, blending adventure with folklore.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Ogress and the Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo's adventure in Tibet and a mysterious, gruesome discovery of a severed talking head, setting a supernatural and unsettling tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Discovery of the Severed Talking Head
The Severed Head's Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Acquisition of the Magic Dagger and Journey to Mourning City
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo rescuing a tied man and receiving a magic dagger as a reward, followed by his arrival at a city in mourning, creating a contrast between initial expectations and grim reality.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Rescues a Tied Man and Receives a Magic Dagger
Marco Polo Meets the King of Hi-toun and Learns of Princess Lotus's Disappearance

sub_scenes.title: Deception, Trap, and Escape from the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sees Marco Polo encountering a woman in distress who leads him to a witch's castle, revealing herself as the Ogress of Tibet and trapping him. Marco then uses his wit and strength to combat monstrous rats and ultimately escape, showcasing his resourcefulness and bravery.

narrative_arcs.title: The Woman in Distress and the Witch's Castle
Entering the Castle and the Ogress's Trap
Combat with Monstrous Rats and Defiance Against the Ogress
Dungeon Escape and Journey to the Father

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra: A Tale of Betrayal and Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc unfolds as a story told within the comic, detailing a prisoner's desperate bargain for freedom by revealing the location of a treasure, leading to betrayal, years of servitude, and a final, violent confrontation and resolution in England.

sub_scenes.title: Story Setup and the Bargain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene frames the narrative as a story being told by a Treasure Keeper and then shifts to a penal colony where a prisoner offers a deal to a Captain, revealing knowledge of a hidden treasure in exchange for freedom, setting up the central conflict of greed and betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: The Map and the Escape Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal and Years of Revenge Planning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene unveils the Captain's betrayal as he escapes with the treasure, leaving Jordan to realize he's been double-crossed. It spans years, showing Jordan's imprisonment and eventual release, culminating in his return to England with a burning desire for revenge.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Escape
Furious Denial and Vow of Revenge
Years Later: Release and Return to England

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Violent Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's patient vigil and eventual confrontation with Captain Brooking, leading to a tense interrogation and a deceptive invitation to Brooking's home, culminating in a deadly fight in the attic where Jordan overcomes Brooking, resolving the revenge plot violently.

narrative_arcs.title: Jordan's Vigil and Brooking's Unaware Planning
Journey to the Attic and Betrayal
Police Respond to Gunshot and Find Wounded Man
Police Observation and Call for Homicide Squad

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features Dr. Styx investigating a haunted estate, encountering the vengeful ghost of Vincent Matthews, and ultimately facilitating his peace through forgiveness and brotherly love, blending supernatural mystery with themes of redemption.

sub_scenes.title: The Case Introduction and Ominous Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and the case of the haunted Matthews estate, starting with a dramatic confrontation and a courtroom sentencing, leading to a realtor seeking Dr. Styx's expertise and receiving a dire warning upon arrival at the estate.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Ominous Warning at Matthews Estate
Disregarding the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Resolution with Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Dr. Styx's entry into the haunted house and his direct confrontation with the ghost of Vincent Matthews, escalating from threats and combat to a deeper exploration of Vincent's hatred and fear, ultimately leading to his redemption through his sister's forgiveness and love.

narrative_arcs.title: Admission of Fear and Search for Salvation
The Sister's Forgiveness and Murder Revelation
Summoning of Rosalind and Her Arrival
Request for Forgiveness and its Granting
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Ill-Fated Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical voyages of Henry Hudson, from his commission to find the Northwest Passage to his tragic mutiny and being cast adrift, highlighting themes of exploration, ambition, and the harsh realities of early seafaring.

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage Commission and Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Hudson's story with a historical overview, then details his commission by the Dutch East India Company for a voyage to find the Northwest Passage, followed by the disappointing realization that the Hudson River is not the passage, leading to a return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition
Weeks at Sea and Talk of Mutiny
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Reflection and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Mutiny, and Tragic Fate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hudson's second voyage, his ship getting trapped in ice, escalating crew discontent, and culminating in a mutiny where Hudson is cast adrift, facing an unknown and likely fatal end, highlighting the perils of exploration and human conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage for the Northern Passage
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement on Course

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Kidnapped Princess
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Arabian Knight, Hassan, on a mission to rescue a kidnapped princess from Tartar horsemen. It encompasses his journey, infiltration of the enemy camp, and a duel for her freedom, showcasing themes of bravery, honor, and romance in a classic adventure setting.

sub_scenes.title: Summons and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Arabian Knight, Hassan, facing an initial threat from Tartar horsemen and then being summoned by the Caliph, who tasks him with a rescue mission to save the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from Kurgan, the Tartar leader.

sub_scenes.title: Journey and Oasis Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's journey through the desert towards the Tartar territory, reaching an unwelcoming oasis where he discovers signs of the Tartars and receives a warning from a traveler, reinforcing the danger of his mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Warning and Revelation at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Contact
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's stealthy infiltration of the Tartar camp, taking down a sentry and using his cloak as a disguise. He overhears a conversation confirming the princess's presence and makes contact with her, initiating the rescue operation.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation, Duel, and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Hassan's discovery by Tartar guards leading to combat and capture, his interrogation by Kurgan, and the proposition of a duel for the princess's freedom. It culminates in the duel itself, Hassan's victory through wit, Kurgan honoring his word, and a budding romance between Hassan and the princess.

narrative_arcs.title: Swift Defeat of the First Opponent
